contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of Nicaragua}} The [[Departments of Nicaragua|departments]] of [[Nicaragua]] are divided into municipalities (''municipios''): [[File:Nicaragua municipalities.png|thumb|right|300px|Municipalities of Nicaragua]] [[File:Nicaragua cities over 20th map.png|thumb|right|300px|Cities over 20,000 inhabitants in Nicaragua (1995 census)]] *[[Acoyapa]]
